import { Link,useN } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navbar.css' import Logo from '../../images/logo.svg' import shop from '../../images/shop.svg' import { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react' import { Icon } from 'react-icons-kit' import { menu } from 'react-icons-kit/feather/menu' import { x } from 'react-icons-kit/feather/x' const Navbar = () => { const [toggle, setToggle] = useState(false); const handleToggle = () => { setToggle(!toggle); } return (

Sri Shanmuga Electronics

{toggle ? : }
Home Gallery Services About us
) } export default Navbar
